div.head: 大小腸熱
div.div: heat in the large and in the small intestine

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: heat in the large and in the small intestine

sense.def: Combined Designation of da chang re 大腸熱 , heat in the large intestine; xiao chang re 小腸熱 , heat in the small intestine. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhi zi 梔子 quotes Tang ye ben cao 湯液本草 : 本草言治 大小 腸熱 , “The BC states: it cures heat in the large and small intestine ”.
